A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m blocking out the negative opinions because I thought this movie was amazing. I totally understand there were some plot holes and one or two things were a tiny bit awkward\, but I got over it all quickly because they will explain most of them somehow\, I know it. I also sensed a different atmosphere to the movie\, but I liked it\, and I liked the humour\, and I thought the ending was proper. Totally recommend this film.
